scripts.start: yarn sprite && cp -r public/* build && concurrently "npx copy-and-watch --watch src/styles/*.css build/styles" "yarn pug src --out build --pretty --watch" "yarn hot-server --port=3000 --dir=build"
scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && mkdir ./build && yarn sprite && cp -r src/styles build && cp -r public/* build && yarn pug src --out build
